name: waltti-apc-vehicle-position-splitter
description: Split Vehicle Position feed snapshots by vehicle and send onwards only the data for vehicles with APC devices onboard, each vehicle in an individual message.

scripts.build: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run build:src
scripts.build:gtfsrt: mkdir -p ./src/protobuf && rm -f ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.* && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 --out ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.js ./protobuf/gtfs-realtime.proto && pbjs --target static-module --wrap es6 ./protobuf/gtfs-realtime.proto | pbts --out ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.d.ts - && prettier --write ./src/protobuf/gtfsRealtime.{js,d.ts}
scripts.build:vehicle-apc-mapping: mkdir -p ./src/quicktype && rm -f ./src/quicktype/vehicle-apc-mapping.ts && quicktype --out ./src/quicktype/vehicle-apc-mapping.ts --top-level VehicleApcMapping --lang ts --src-lang schema --src ./quicktype/vehicle-apc-mapping.schema.json --no-date-times --alphabetize-properties --telemetry disable --explicit-unions && prettier --write ./src/quicktype/vehicle-apc-mapping.ts && export TMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && echo '// @ts-nocheck' > "${TMPFILE}" && cat ./src/quicktype/vehicle-apc-mapping.ts >> "${TMPFILE}" && mv "${TMPFILE}" ./src/quicktype/vehicle-apc-mapping.ts
scripts.check-and-build: npm run build:protobuf && npm run build:quicktype && npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build

author: pnupu <ilkka@vertics.co>
